segments.text: So will you come to work with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I use my green pad again to write you admiring notes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll have to negotiate that . It's a possibility .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I'm in . When do I start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As soon as you can get here . We'll be waiting for you .
segments.speaker: S1
